General.Name: Jiangsu Sunshine Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Sunshine Co., Ltd. engages in the wool textile and thermal power businesses in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It produces and sells woolen fabrics for use in suits, coats, dresses, and other clothing; worsted wool; and electricity and steam. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Jiangyin, the People's Republic of China.
